attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am a 14 year old muslim girl , i come from a big family who are very happy BUT..... i think that racism in art is just as much as just being racist to my face , all my life i,ve put up with people disrespecting me and treating me differently but now i,m old enough to take action

rejection.details: We can not accept your petition as you make claims about an artist that we can not verify. Please remove the reference to the individual in your title and resubmit.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
